DOC.brief_summary: Comparison efficacy safety T2750 Vismed® treatment moderate severe Dry Eye Syndrome
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Efficacy Safety T2750 Vismed® Treatment Moderate Severe Dry Eye Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Signed date informed consent Male female age ≥ 18 year old . Known Dry Eye Syndrome require artificial tear within last 3 month prior study selection . Best far correct visual acuity < 1/10 Severe blepharitis Severe Dry Eye Eyelid malposition Known hypersensitivity one component study medication test product . Pregnant breastfeed woman . Woman childbearing age ( neither menopausal , hysterectomised , sterilize ) use effective contraception ( oral contraceptive , intrauterine device , contraceptive implant condom ) . Inability patient understand study procedure thus inability give informed consent . Non compliant patient ( e.g . willing attend followup visit , way life interfere compliance ) . Already include study . Patient guardianship .
